org.vaniglia.socket.socketserver
Interface ServerDelegate

public interface ServerDelegate

Method Summary
 void close()
          This method is called after all the request are executed and before removing the ServerDelegate.

          This method is used to handle the request.

Method Detail

init

public void init()
This method is called before any request. It is used to initialize the ServerDelegate.

public java.lang.String readRequest(java.io.BufferedReader in)
                             throws java.io.IOException
This method is used by the SocketServer to read the request form the input socket.

Parameters:
in - the input channel
Returns:
the request read
Throws:
java.io.IOException

handleRequest

public java.lang.String handleRequest(java.lang.String request)
This method is used to handle the request.

Parameters:

Returns:
the result

writeResult

public void writeResult(java.lang.String result,
                        java.io.PrintWriter out)
This method is used to write the result to the output socket.

Parameters:
result - the result to write
out - the output channel

close

public void close()
This method is called after all the request are executed and before removing the ServerDelegate. It is used to perform clean up operations
